org.ingatan.data
Class AnswerFieldsFile

java.lang.Object
  org.ingatan.data.AnswerFieldsFile

public class AnswerFieldsFile
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates the data from the answer fields file. It contains a list of the classes and class IDs for all default answer fields and all answer fields that have been added as plug-ins. It also contains the default values for the answer fields, as set by the user.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham

Constructor Detail

AnswerFieldsFile

public AnswerFieldsFile(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class> answerFields,
                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fieldDefaults)
Creates a new AnswerFieldsFile.

Parameters:
answerFields - Hashtable containing the loaded classes for the answer fields, mapped by their class name
fieldDefaults - The defaults for the answers fields. These are generated and read by AnswerField implementations. Defaults are generated by the user.
